tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE hotel_supplies (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    quantity INT,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE supply_usage (
    usage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_id INT,
    amenity_id INT,
    date_used DATE,
    quantity_used INT
);

CREATE TABLE supply_transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  supply_id INT,
  supplier_id INT,
  quantity INT,
  transaction_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE hotel (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
name TEXT,
location TEXT,
rooms INT);

CREATE TABLE supplies (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
name TEXT,
quantity INT,
price DECIMAL);

CREATE TABLE amenities (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
name TEXT,
description TEXT,
availability BOOLEAN);

CREATE TABLE orders (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
supply_id INT REFERENCES supplies(id),
amenity_id INT REFERENCES amenities(id),
quantity INT,
date_ordered TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE reservations (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
room_id INT REFERENCES hotel(id),
start_date DATE,
end_date DATE,
status TEXT);
